content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 1.0, 1.0) with a current status of EntityStatus.WORKING, which processes copper ore into copper plates.

### Wooden chests
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, 1.5) containing 50 iron plates.
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, 3.5) containing 50 iron plates.
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, 5.5) which is currently empty.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough copper plates and coal in your inventory before attempting to craft items or fuel the furnace.

### Errors when using the furnace
- The furnace requires coal to operate. Make sure to insert coal into the furnace to keep it running.

### Errors when extracting from the furnace
- Make sure to check the status of the furnace before extracting items, as it may not have produced any copper plates yet.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has enough capacity to accept the items being inserted. If the furnace is full or not operational, the insertion will fail.
